amendment.description: Amendment sought to clarify the terms "propaganda", "publicity", and "advocacy", within the rule's prohibited communications, to mean any information, statements or claims that are unsupported by science or empirical data.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 234 (Roll no. 122).

action.text: Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
